title: Trump: "When You Open Your Heart To Patriotism, There Is No Room For Prejudice"
text:
Trump: "When You Open Your Heart To Patriotism, There Is No Room For Prejudice" | Posted By Ian Schwartz   
President Donald Trump talked about American loyalty and patriotism in his inaugural address Friday afternoon. The president said, "when you open your heart to patriotism, there is no room for prejudice." PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP: We will seek friendship and goodwill with the nations of the world, but we do so with the understanding that it is the right of all nations to put their own interests first. We do not seek to impose our way of life on anyone, but rather to let it shine as an example, we will shine for everyone to follow. We will reinforce old alliances and form new ones, and you night the civilized world against radical islamic terrorism, which we will eradicate completely from the face of the Earth. At the bedrock of our politics will be a total allegiance to the United States of America, and through our loyalty to our country, we will rediscover our loyalty to each other. When you open your heart to patriotism, there is no room for prejudice. Watch the full inaugural address here . Related Videos
